The game definitely can be lots of fun, especially with/against friends, but online it's a completely different story.
The community is toxic, the level difference in matchmaking is a fucking joke and often enough you play against tunnelers, AFKs or just god-like players who haven't spend a single minute outside this game since release. 
Though for some reason, I find myself crawling back to it, hoping something would've changed. It is kinda like an addiction.

Alors voila je ne recommande pas ce jeu pour la simple et bonne raison que les Devs s'en fiche royal de leurs joueurs.
La dernière mise à jour a totalement pour moi et la plus part des joueurs ruiner notre expérience de jeu , L'anti aliasing a été forcet et il y'a un flou dégueulasse , perte de 10~15 FPS , si vous avez un PC low end n'y jouer pas , ne l'acheter pas.
Les devs n'écoutent pas leurs joueurs et selectionne uniquement les questions dans les Q&A qui sont pas compliquer à répondre et qui n'intéresse personne , et si vous avez l'audace d'insister sur un parmi les dizaines de problèmes sur DBD vous vous faites Ban du forum définitivement et Target ban sur tous les comptes que vous créerez sans même un seul message ou une seule réponse sur l'un de vos post .

Je ne recommande absolument pas pour le coup .

Game: 10/10
Community: 0/10
Pros:
- Fun gameplay, no match is the same.
- Many characters and perks to choose from to suit your playstyle
Cons:
- Microtransactions.
This game has a lot of stuff locked behind DLC.
And more often than not the most meta perks and characters are the ones you need to pay for.
- Grindy, this game is a bit to grindy for my liking.
Some may actually like this but many will not.

Overall, I would recommend you to buy the game.
Its fun and original, you wont find any experience similar. (Except that shitty Friday The 13th game).
This game is amazing if you got friends to play it with,

El juego es muy divertido y tiene unos gráficos decentes que en general permiten una buena experiencia. 
Si te estás planteando comprarlo y te gusta la fórmula de este juego, es decir, el poner todo de tu parte para intentar escapar siendo superviviente o reventar a todos siendo asesino, este juego es para ti.
En contra puedo decir que los tiempos de cola para encontrar partida son demasiado largos, así como los micropagos que tienes que hacer si quieres tener todos los personajes del juego.
Помойка с багами, сегодня вот застрял в паллете. К покупке не рекомендую + много агрессивных игроков и токсиков, а ещё у крюка застрял. убежать не мог

Такая ху**я, я еб** эти 10 километровые хиты. Не игра а помойная яма для дал*****в. Багов бл**ь как в Египте писка. Я желаю смерти даунам которые не умеют играть, и кроме как кемпить и сосать огромный жирный х*й, ничего не могут. Ебан**ся просто, какова х*я я уже за 100000000 км от окна, ман в этот момент хитует куст и хит проходит по мне, куст вам чо бл*ть кукла вуду? Какова хуя когда я играю за нюрсу, сурв су*а в 3ёх см от меня, я его хитую и он такой "Пох*й" и на спидах улетает через закрытые ворота бл*ть, в тот момент когда меня спиной за 43265723876598273 км хитует трапер с другого конца Поместья Ямаоке, когда я играю бл*ть на мясокомбинате. Орех, осколок и фонарь это тупо рофл для игры, юзаю орех меня хитуют, срабатывает осколок я попадаю в скилл чек и дальше как куртизанка на плече лечу на крюк, фонарик это тупо стендап для мана, как им слепить? Оно не слепит даже когда ман тупо 5 часов стоит и палит меня за 3 м от меня, мне его бл*ть маяком надо слепить? игра кстати ничо такая мне зашло

I cannot fully recommend this game to new players because of 3 issues. I do not really foresee Behavior being able to fix these issues anytime soon so for now I'll just leave it on "no". Before going into detail, I do want to emphasize that the first 100 hours or so will be extremely fun, as learning the mechanics of the game and being able to make decent plays for the first time really make great moments. I also want to mention that I have about 50/50 in terms of time spent on survivor and killer. I have been playing off an on for years as well.


Issue #1
Ranking/Emblem System

The ranking and emblem system is terrible, especially for killers. Neither of these really reward the player for playing well, or making plays, but instead force the player to complete this trivial check list in order to rank up. I've have numerous games where I get 3 sacrifices and a death or something similar where no survivor escapes and do not rank up. This leads us to our next issue.

Issue #2
Focus

Tying along with the emblem system, Behavior really forced the player to abide by playing in a certain style if the player wants to rank up. Many people would probably imagine that the killer's goal is to sacrifice all of the survivors as soon as possible and the survivors need to escape as soon as possible. With this new system, the focus on the core objective changes and more or less skewed from it originally was. On top of this, they have implemented new ways to discourage bad play (ie Camping, Tunneling, etc) which leads to our last and most important issue.

Issue #3
Balance

This game has changed drastically since I started; bloodlust did not exist, infinite loops existed, and there were only 3 killers. Now that this game has so much content, there are numerous builds and killers to play as, or so most think. Unfortunately, many people including myself agree that Behavior is terrible when it comes to balancing. Many perks have been reworked, some which were meta are now useless (Unrelenting, Hex:Ruin) or some that start as meta, nerfed hard, and then bounce back as meta (Decisive Strike). A lot of the new killers and survivors that have come out recently do not really change the meta as much as before (ie, Myers DLC had way more impact than the Chains of Hate DLC). The responses that Behavior has given seems really careless, as many players think that they do not listen to their dedicated fanbase, and instead try to cater to newer players. Having new players is great, but having them at the cost of an angry dedicated fanbase is not worth it. I do not really have any solutions to fix this issue, mostly because I think the damage has been done for so long that I am unsure how they can recover from this. With the issue of the Stranger Things DLC not being available soon, it's obvious that this game was not intended to last that long and Behavior has been pumping out subpar DLC for a while. Major balance cannot be achieved unless the core mechanics/win condition changes at this point.

With that, if you can ignore these 4 issues or feel that they are not that bad, then yeah, go for it. I hope that Behavior eventually is able to make this into a great game because I would really want to continue playing this. For now, I think I will join growing crowd of unhappy players.

Seit November 2016 spiel ich DbD, ich muss sagen das Game hat sich gut weiterentwickelt. 
Finde die Idee mit dem Archiv gut, bringt etwas Abwechslung rein - wenn man mit einem bestimmten Ziel die Runde startet.
Ansonsten hat dieses Game eine bunt gemischte Spielweise, es gibt welche die Campen,Tunneln etc. aber mich stört das nicht - jeder hat seine EIGENE Spielweiße. Klar macht ne Runde mit Campenden Killer nicht so viel Spaß dafür versuche ich in der nächsten Runde mehr Spaß zuhaben
